name: Village Rites
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: The Skelle raise scorn poles in conquered villages—cursed totems of wood and bone that sap survivors of physical strength and the will to fight back.

name: Koma's Faithful
oracle_text:
Lifelink
When Koma's Faithful dies, each player mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Great Serpent, hear my song! We wait, our faith unshaken, for your glorious return."

name: Seize the Spoils
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "Grab what you want and burn the rest. Leave nothing behind."

Flying, lifelink

oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
As long as you control a Giant, you may cast Glimpse the Cosmos from your graveyard by paying {U} rather than paying its mana cost. If you cast Glimpse the Cosmos this way and it would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

name: Arctic Treeline
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Arctic Treeline enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"When the light of Starnheim shines here, every frost-edged needle glitters with the reflected glory of the Cosmos."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Glacial Floodplain
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Glacial Floodplain enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"A cliff once rose from the surf here—until Bjora Dawn-Greeter declared that it was blocking her view and pulled it down bare-handed."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Alpine Meadow
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
Alpine Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Here perished Rognar the Reckless after his hundred-day battle with the Ironmaw Dragon. We raised these stones to mark his resting place."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Highland Forest
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Highland Forest enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Tread carefully! The last time I walked this path, half the snowdrifts were, in fact, sleeping trolls. I've never run so fast in my life!"
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Ice Tunnel
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
Ice Tunnel enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"The ice cracked underfoot; strange shapes swam beneath the surface. Who else has walked this blighted path?"
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Rimewood Falls
flavor_text:
"For a fortnight, our warband lay still beneath the icy waters, breathing through reeds as we waited for the great bear to appear."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Snowfield Sinkhole
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
Snowfield Sinkhole enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Young Vitima bellowed to the Cosmos, daring the gods to punish her hubris!! Well, she got their attention, as you can see."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Sulfurous Mine
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)
Sulfurous Mine enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"In my youth, we used to best each other at hopping rabbit-fast between the lava spouts, the burning tar spattering our legs."
—Iskene, Kannah storyteller

name: Volatile Fjord
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)

flavor_text:

name: Woodland Chasm
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
